close_counter_warn: Settlement done, please proceed to close counter
confirm_delete: will be remove from cart. Click yes to proceed
confirm_logout_desc:
All of your previous login device will be force logout and all of the data in previous login device will be clear
(will backup in cloud database), Type YES to continue
inconsistent_table_layout: Inconsistent table layout. Please refresh and try again
lan_printer_not_connect: Printer not connected. Please check your internet connection
logout_desc: This device is force to logout, because multiple log in on this account is detected
logout_desc2: All the app data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, setting, database etc.
merge_error_2: Cannot join with table not in use or table in use
refund_desc: Are you sure to refund this order?
remove_layout_error: remove layout error, Please try again
settlement_role_error: Only owner & manager can do settlement
settlement_desc: All today cash record will remove, You can check history on settlement history
submit_fail2: Submit fail, at least one option is open
to_merge_bill: This is a merge bill payment. Click 'YES' to proceed
to_pos_pin: You will be redirected to pos pin page, Click yes to proceed
usb_printer_not_connect: Printer not connected. Please check your usb plugin
